General.Name: Avalue Technology
General.Description: Avalue Technology Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells embedded computing solutions in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers industrial and embedded motherboards; industrial PC/computers, such as embedded, transportation, rackmount, and ARM based systems; and panel PCs, including industrial, medical, and open frame panel PCs, as well as industrial displays, audio and video extenders, peripherals and accessories, panel kits, and panel and touch technologies. It also provides computer-on-module products for critical or industrial applications; point of sale (POS) terminals, which includes desktop and compact POS; medical tablets, and semi rugged tablet and accessories; device management software; high performance computing solutions; embedded peripherals; E ink solutions, such as public display, healthcare IoT, and E ink technologies solutions; ODM services; and intelligent solutions. Its products are used in healthcare, retail, gaming, manufacturing, and transportation applications. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: 228, Lian-cheng Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 235
